subject: RE: [Read_Alphabet] keyboard map uploaded
msgSnippet: Oliver: Thanks for the response.  Your ideas are in line with my own wishes for QS.  Can t discuss them now, however, as I m late getting on the road for a
messageBody:
Oliver:

 

Thanks for the response.  Your ideas are in line with my own wishes for QS.  Can’t discuss them now, however, as I’m late getting on the road for a camping July 4th weekend.  My friends await.  When I’m back next week we can discuss this some more.  Happy Independence day to you as well.  I’m in southern Indiana across from Louisville, Kentucky. 

 

Paige

 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: oliver langan [mailto:yahoo@...]
Sent: Saturday, July 03, 2004 12:32 PM
To: Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [Read_Alphabet] keyboard map uploaded

 

I realized that I had never uploaded that keyboard mapping to the files area.  It is in the
Resources folder now.

And, by the way, Happy Fourth of July to any fellow Americans.  One good thing about
being here in Japan is that fireworks are easily available and I can go light them off at the
temple across the street.  Now I just have to find some hot dogs and apple pie.

o
